layout.name: levelTitle
layout.title: Level Title
layout.tooltip: Title shown when standing on this tile.

layout.name: alwaysVisible
layout.title: Always Visible
layout.tooltip: If checked, the level will always be visible, even when locked.

layout.name: warpName
layout.title: Warp Name
layout.tooltip: The internal name of the warp (not shown to the player).

layout.name: destinationWarpName
layout.title: Destination Warp's Name
layout.tooltip: The internal name of the warp that this one leads to (not shown to the player).

layout.name: levelFilename
layout.title: Level Filename
layout.tooltip: Filename of the level associated with this tile.

layout.name: warpIndex
layout.title:
Entrance
Warp Index
layout.tooltip: The warp that the player starts at when entering the level. 0 means no warp and starting from the usual start point.

layout.name: exitWarpIndex
layout.title: Exit warp index
layout.tooltip: The warp that the player must take to warp to the indicated level warp.

children.name: unlock_up
children.title: Top Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's top path will be open.

children.name: unlock_right
children.title: Right Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's right path will be open.

children.name: unlock_down
children.title: Down Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's bottom path will be open.

children.name: unlock_left
children.title: Left Unlock
